name: t09_string_format
description: String-heavy formatting and logging module with sprintf/snprintf, manual string builders, and cross-file format dispatch. Exercises GCC's string constant merging and stack buffer handling.
oracle_pressure: String constants may be merged in .rodata across TUs at O1+. Stack buffers for snprintf introduce DW_TAG_variable entries with DW_AT_location pointing to frame offsets that shift across O-levels. Oracle must track these relocations.
